title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the impressive win for the Warriors in game 2 of the NBA Finals and what this means for the series going forward. He points out the one star player in the Finals who needs more recognition for his impact on the game. He also tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Bill Belichick. Plus, NBA insider Ethan Strauss joins the show to tell Colin if this is the final run for the Warriors dynasty. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
